author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  Make the textual representations (noderevs
and change lists) in FSX handle control chars.  The binary container
representations don't have this problem and as soon as we eliminate the
textual representations, this escapement will no longer be necessary.
auto_unescape_path): new utility methods for escaping paths
x_make_file): no longer check for newlines in path parameters
